sentence.text: Heterozygous negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase IIH/+ females showed no obvious abnormalities before pregnancy, but when mated with wild-type (WT) males developed a full spectrum of preeclampsia-like phenotypes, including increased systolic blood pressure, proteinuria, glomerular endotheliosis, and intrauterine fetal growth restriction.

entity.text: negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II
